meanings.sent1: The intercellular communication between the plant cells helps them coordinate their growth.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the intercellular interactions to understand how cells work together in the body.
meanings.sent3: The intercellular dance party was a hit among the microscopic organisms.
meanings.sent4: The intercellular bridges between the nerve cells allowed for quick transmission of signals.
meanings.sent5: The intercellular spaces in the tissue were like tiny highways for information exchange.

meanings.definition: Relating to or existing within a cell.
meanings.sent1: The intercellular structures within the cell play a crucial role in its functions.
meanings.sent2: The intercellular fluid provides nutrients to the cell and helps in waste removal.
meanings.sent3: The intercellular party inside the cell nucleus was a celebration of genetic material.
meanings.sent4: The intercellular pathways allowed for efficient transport of molecules within the cell.
meanings.sent5: The intercellular organelles worked together like a well-oiled machine within the cell.
